Articles.Content:
That's pretty straightforward: seeing the complexity and complaints about the controls on console, I think it would be helpful to have an official and complete controls list, including combinations to open cheats/F3/etc menus.

Would be a lot easier than having to look through a lot of threads to find them.

It would be extremely useful to be able to remap console controls. LB/Rb on the map screen constantly shift you to other bodies when you're trying to do any of the many things that require the use of these buttons. This applies to Ps4 and Xbox versions I hear, though I don't know the equivalent buttons on the Ps4 side.
